title: List of all Androidcircle imageview   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidcircle imageview   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: RoundImage
repoList.description: This library is used for converting Bitmap or Drawable images to Round or Circular Shape. Round image view for Android or Circular Image View for Android.Tags Android Round Circularimageview Circle Rounded Corner imageview library.

repoList.name: CoolView
repoList.description: An Android Library that help you to customize views (Button, EditText, ImageView), by adding border with the size and color that you want, and give it  the corner radius that you seems cool, and you can also make an imageview looks like a circle.

repoList.name: AndroidCropCircleLayout
repoList.description: This library will allow developer to crop their relative layout in circle with style like gmail profile image.

repoList.name: CircularImage
repoList.description: [Android Library] Library that creates a circled - shape imageView , from an external source or a chosen color.
